BLACKPINK:
Let us take a look at BLACKPINK's journey on the Spotify Top 200 Weekly South Africa chart. 
 They have had a total of 20 songs with approximately 1864170854 million streams. 
As of 2023-04-20, they have released music with 2018 YG Entertainment, distributed through Interscope Records .... YG Entertainment .... YG Entertainment, distributed through Interscope Records .... YG Entertainment/Interscope Records
They first appeared on the chart on 2017-06-29. Their most recent appearance has been on 2023-04-20
Their highest position on the chart is 1 for the song Shut Down which was at this position on 2022-09-22
Their lowest position on the chart is 200 for the song How You Like That which was at this position on 2021-03-11
